flavor_text: [i]Ivenge had seen fit to make the new world forget its former rulers—but as the salvager stared into the skull's eyes, the bones around him stirred, and memories of ancestral rites unfolded in his mind.[/i]
notes: Ivenge thought he'd slain Lovi's old rulers and drowned their legacies in his new world—but in the forgotten places, those desperate for aid found their masters waiting to it once more.
